text: Had this idea over the weekend. *What do you guys think of having a button in the extension’s pop up that when clicked pops up a HubSpot account picker - and then takes you right to the design manager* for that account?
(no account data is shared with the extension at all to make this happen)
That would be really helpful, a nice timesaver
I thought so. Kinda my solution to the fact the account switcher in the dropdown isn’t easy to use if you have a ton of accounts.

Feature should arrive this week. If anyone speaks a different language I’ll need help translating “Open Design Manager” into other languages.

I could use google translate but for all I know it will translate into orcish in that other language. Something like: “expand art boss” or something ridiculous, so any help is appreciated.

Translator does not need to be a coder at all, just needs to be able to translate the words so they don’t sound dumb in the other language.

language codes the extension supports:
de :de:
en :uk::us: :flag-ca:
es :es:
fr :fr:
ja :japan:
pt-br :flag-br:

lol I’ve thought of treating canada different from the rest of en - and making their buttons all be sterotypical canadianisms/minnesota nice sorta talk. instead of “Open Design Manager” it’d say “Open Design Manager Please”

“Debug Mode” = “Found a bug ey?”
